channel.title: Do i got vps now? please help!
channel.description: [font=arial black][size=12pt]I need to know if this is the right program to have a vps?? please reply and tell if i got a vps and my server is 24/7 or if i don't have!![/size][/font] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/au6uti.png[/img] [font=georgia][size=18pt] Its named: AlwaysOnPc![/size][/font]

item.title: Do i got vps now? please help!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

I understand that you can host it from a different computer but if Urge doesn’t have 2 computers in his house as in the first computer server and too setup vps from the second computer it mostly will just add more memory space onto his only computer he has and that’s why he probably didn’t understand?

Read full topic
item.source: Do i got vps now? please help!

item.title: Do i got vps now? please help!
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

durrh… but if he wanted to use it on his computer he’s hosting it would give him more RAM

thats true, but rushed is right too, a VPS is merely a server PC what u connect to via windows.
your both right, you just didnt understand eachother well enough

Read full topic

item.title: Do i got vps now? please help!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:4, topic:423043”]nope that picture you put up is useless and has nothing to do with vps, so your basically hosting it off your computer 24/7 which is using your RAM (MEMORY) on your computer & for cheap vps it starts around $24.00+ charged monthly here are some sites btw if you didnt know vps gives you more memory on your computer to host so the computer wont overheat or crash
http://www.vpsland.com/
http://pandela.com/[/quote]

Ultimate do you know what your saying? Your saying a VPS gives you more memory on your computer? What on earth are you talking about? A VPS is another computer that you purchase so you can host something so you don’t have to leave yours on.

Read full topic
item.source: Do i got vps now? please help!
